content.html: If you take the word “sex” out of “sex work,” in any conversation like this and it changes your opinion, then clearly you’re problem isn’t with the working, it’s with the sex. The therapy you need has never been easier to find. Let’s get you the help you need. We’re here for you.
content.value:
If you take the word “sex” out of “sex work,” in any conversation like this and it changes your opinion, then clearly you’re problem isn’t with the working, it’s with the sex.
The therapy you need has never been easier to find. Let’s get you the help you need. We’re here for you.
